runs.comm: excellent ball to start with, on a good length on middle stump, angling across the left-hander from over the wicket, the ball stops on Tharanga who drives uppishly to cover

caught! Asif pitches just short of a length, Tharanga tries to pull against the angle of the ball and gets a top edge that flies straight to Umar Gul at third man, Pakistan strike and Sri Lanka haven't scored yet
defended solidly on the front foot back to Asif
Jayasuriya tries to pull this time but the angle across the left-hander makes it a difficult shot to play, he lobs it into the gap at midwicket for two runs

dropped! Jayasuriya plays a half-hearted pull shot to a good length ball, once again the top edge flies high in the air, Tanvir runs back from short fine leg but doesn't even get close to what should have been a relatively comfortable catch, big let off for Jayasuriya
pushed towards cover point for a single

bowled him! What a comeback! Tanvir bowls the yorker on off stump, Jayasuriya tries to play across the line and gets clean bowled, Tanvir makes up for his dropped catch and completes a terrible match for Jayasuriya
pitches outside off stump from over the wicket and slants the ball away from Jayawardene who lets it go
another one slants away from Jayawardene who doesn't move his feet while trying to cut and gets beaten
another one pitches outside off stump and moves away from Jayawardene, that was measured at 129 kmh but he seems far quicker
Jayawardene drives away from his body and gets a thick outside edge that falls just short of Hafeez who dives forward at point
good length ball on off stump, Sangakkara strides forward and drives to Afridi at cover
good length ball angles into Jayawardene's middle stump, he moves on to the front foot and defends back to the bowler
the ball jags back sharply into Jayawardene from off stump, he has to hurry and plays a glance off his hips behind square
Sangakkara waits on the back foot and defends a short of a length delivery towards cover, Jayawardene takes a few paces down from the non-striker's end but Sangakkara sends him back
hits a good length on off stump and seams away from the left-hander off the pitch, Sangakkara shoulders arms
Asif induces the outside edge with a good length ball that rose sharply, Sangakkara tried to fend it down behind point but was lucky as the edge flew wide off first slip to Gul at third man
Sangakkara steps down the track and moves towards leg to make room, he frees his arms and throws his bat at a length delivery and slashes it over the backward point boundary
Jayawardene tries to back away and hits through the off side but gets beaten by the angle across him
Jayawardene backs away this time and tries to pull, Tanvir bangs it in short and is far too quick for Jayawardene who has to bail out of the shot
Jayawardene defends a good length ball on off stump with soft hands towards short cover and responds to Sangakkara's call for a single
Sangakkara uses the angle into him to play the ball off his pads through backward square leg
that was wide down leg side, Jayawardene tries to help it down to fine leg but misses
once again he pitches on leg stump, Jayawardene wanted to move towards leg but changed his mind, the ball brushes the thigh pad and runs past short fine leg for four
too straight from Tanvir, Jayawardene moves across his stumps and flicks behind square for two more
Asif drops too short, giving Sangakkara time to move back in his crease and pull the ball to the backward square leg boundary
this time Sangakkara backs away a fraction and runs the ball down to third man for a single
Jayawardene moves towards the off side and opens the face of the bat to collect a single to third man
the attempted slower ball goes terribly wrong and Asif concedes a wide down leg side
that that says Sangakkara! He times the charge down the pitch superbly, and blasts the cover drive for four, that was hit powerfully

bowled and how! Sangakkara tries to pull a short of a length ball, he doesn't make contact and gets hit on the pad, the ball bounces off the pad, hits his arms and dislodges a bail, Sangakkara swings his bat in disappointment
Asif picthes outside off stump and cuts the ball back sharply into Silva who moves back and defends towards cover
pitches wide outside off stump and moves further away from Jayawardene, a wide is called
Jayawardene moves across his stumps, gets inside the line of a leg-stump delivery and nudges the ball off his hips for a boundary to fine leg, the fielder was place at short fine leg
another extremely wide wide outside off stump, Jayawardene tries to slash it over point but wasn't close to making contact
this one pitches on middle and off and slants across Jayawardene who pokes at it and gets beaten
excellent fielding from Hafeez who dives to his right at point and stops a well-timed cut from Jayawardene
Siilva hardly moves his feet and tries to play the ball through the off side, he gets beaten by the sharp angle across him
Silva doesn't move his feet again and hangs his bat out at the ball outside off stump, the outside edge goes to third man on the bounce

Jayawardene backs away towards leg stump, Tanvir follows him with a  full ball and Jayawardene flicks off his pads over the long-leg boundary, the ball is superbly caught but by a spectator in the stands
Silva moves towards the off side and short-arm pulls Asif to the deep square leg boundary
expertly timed, Silva makes room and uses the width to cut a good length ball past backward point for four more
Asif over-steps and drifts down leg side as well, Silva has a free hit coming up, he cannot be out in any other way than run out
Asif bowls a short ball, Silva stands his ground and pulls, the top edge flies over Akmal's head and goes all the way, this is an expensive over from Asif
another no-ball outside off stump, which Silva top-edges to third man, Jayawardene will be on strike for the free hit so Malik can change the field
Jayawardene moves towards the off side, Asif bowls outside off, Jayawardene tries to drive but gets an edge that runs past Akmal for another boundary
defended towards point off the back foot
the ball bounces sharply into Jayawardene from outside off stump, he adjusts well and opens the face to run the ball down to third man
he runs in and just halts for a moment before delivering a full ball on middle stump, Jayawardene flicks through midwicket
Silva moves across his stumps, gets down on one knee and sweeps past short fine leg for four
Hafeez starts down leg side, Silva pushes the ball gently into the huge gap at square leg and gets two
Silva strides forward and pushes the ball off his pads to midwicket
driven off the front foot to long-on for a single
Jayawardene moves towards the off side and slog sweeps Hafeez from off and middle stump to deep backward square leg where Butt moves to his right and fields
starts off with a slower ball which Jayawardene tries to pull, he was early on the shot and top-edged it towards deep square leg where it falls safely in the outfield
Silva tries to drive but gets beaten outside off stump
pulled to deep midwicket for a single
Jayawardene moves towards the off and pulls past square leg
driven off the front foot through cover for a quick single
Jayawardene backs away exposing all three stumps, Afridi bowls a quicker ball which Jayawardene cuts from middle stump to short third man
Silva moves across his stumps and tries to slog sweep but misses and is hit on the pad
dropped short outside the off side, Silva backs away and cuts through point
Jayawardene drives the ball from the blockhole towards midwicket
Silva gets down on one knee and drives through midwicket
Jayawardene comes down the pitch but doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, he cuts past point
full toss driven hard but straight back to the bowler

caught at deep square leg! Jayawardene moves towards the off side and slog sweeps Afridi, Jayawardene doesn't get the distance to clear the boundary and Hafeez takes the catch just inside the boudnary
driven to long-of for a single
width offered outside off stump, Dilshan drives powerfully but straight to cover
cut firmly off the back foot to Younis at point
slower ball from Afridi on middle and leg, played off the pads towards square leg
tossed up teasingly on off stump, Silva dabs it towards Younis at point
cut off the back foot to backward point
Hafeez fires the quicker one down leg side and concedes a wide
full ball on middle stump, driven through midwicket
driven off the front foot to long-on for a single
bowled full and quick, Silva forces the ball through midwicket off the back foot
Hafeez tosses the ball up a little, Dilshan gets underneath it and lofts the ball cleanly over the deep square leg boundary, that went miles in the air
he plays the reverse sweep from middle stump to short third man
bowled flat into the blockhole on middle stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
Silva waits for the slower ball and pulls in front of deep midwicket where Hafeez dives on the line, gets a hand to it and palms the ball over the ropes
beaten by a quicker delivery outside the off stump
Afridi fires in a quicker ball outside off stump, Silva changes his shot at the last moment and opens the face to run the ball to the third man boundary
bowled by the yorker! Afridi fires the ball in on middle stump, Silva moves across his stumps and tries to play through the leg side, he gets yorked and the ball hits middle stump
Mubarak strides forward and gets hit on the pad, the ball runs past Akmal for a leg bye to short man
bowled short of a length on middle stump, Mubarak tries to pull but doesn't make contact
once again Mubarak tries to play the pull to a ball that isn't short, he gets hit on the thigh

caught! Mubarak goes for the attempted pull once again, the ball hurries on to him from a good length, Mubarak hits the ball with the high part of the bat and lobs a tame catch to Afridi at midwicket, Pakistan are squarely on top
Gul fires in a quick ball on middle stump, Dilshan backs away and drives towards mid-on
Wijekoon tries to pull a fiery bouncer at 140kmh but gets beaten for pace
he backs away this time and tries to hit through the off side, Gul beats him with the slower ball that just misses off stump
dropped a fraction short outside off stump, Dilshan backs away and cuts to point
full ball on off stump, driven off the front foot to long-off
Afridi tosses one up outside leg stump, Wijekoon tries to play it past fine leg but misses
flat-batted back to the bowler off the back foot
caught! Wijekoon tries to slog Afridi across the line towards the leg side, he gets a top edge that flies to Hafeez at point who takes an easy catch
fired in quick outside the off stump, the batsman tries to cut but gets beaten
driven to long off for a single to end Afridi's spell, 3 for 18 off four overs, simply outstanding
Dilshan waits on the back foot and drives a full ball to long-off
not that short from Gul but Vaas tries to pull the ball, he mis-hits it to long-on
Dilshan tries to play a cheeky paddle over short fine leg but Gul beats him with a slower ball outside off stump
Dilshan moves his front foot out of the way and tries to smash the ball through the off side, he gets beaten by a good length ball once again
once again he clears his front foot out of the way and tries to drive through cover, Gul's length is perfect and the ball beats the bat
Gul finishes the over with a yorker which Dilshan drives towards cover
Dilshan moves across towards the off side, gets down one knee, and tries to paddle behind square leg, Tanvir bowls a slower ball outside off stump which bounces over Dilshan
another slower ball outside off stump, Dilshan plays it down to Nazir at third man and they run two runs, the umpire signals one short
wide down leg side
driven off the front foot towards deep cover
full ball angles into Vaas' leg stump, Vaas gets caught on the crease and gets hit on the pad
just a fraction short, Vaas uses the angle coming into him, moves across his stumps and pulls through square leg
slow full toss outside off stump, Vaas mis-times it towards cover point
Gul fires in the yorker but it ends up as a low full toss which Vaas drives through midwicket, 31 balls since Sri Lanka hit their last boundary
sliced off the back foot to deep point where Tanvir picks up and sends it a rocket-like throw
Gul digs the bouncer in and Vaas manages to pull it over midwicket for a single
a short of a length slower ball outside off stump, Dilshan backs away and tries to cut but gets beaten by the lack of pace
full ball on middle stump, Dilshan tries to swing it away through midwicket but gets an inside edge to long leg
short ball outside off stump, Vaas pulls to Malik at midwicket and runs the single, had Malik hit at the bowler's end, Vaas was a goner
full toss outside off stump from Hafeez, driven through covers for another single
full toss on middle stump, Dilshan swings and swings hard, he connects finally and sends the ball flying over deep square leg, that's the 150th six of the tournament
Dilshan gets down on one knee and slog sweeps another one over deep bckward square leg
Dilshan tries to reverse sweep but misses, Hafeez strays down leg side and a wide is given
dropped and six! Younis Khan drops the slog sweep on the boundary and the ball bounces off his hands and goes over the ropes
caught! Dilshan tries to hit the fourth six of the over but this time he doesn't get the elevation, Younis sprints to his right, slides and takes an excellent catch on the run
driven to long-on for a single
full ball down leg side, Vaas tries to move across his stumps and flick but misses
good length ball on off stump, Vaas pulls straight past the bowler for a single
full ball angled into the right-hander, Malinga tries to make room but Gul followed him, pushed towards mid-on for a single
Vaas tries to pull a length ball but bottom-edges it next to the stumps, Malinga calls for the single, Akmal runs in and throws the ball at the bowler's end but misses the stumps
short ball outside off stump, Malinga backs away and tries to hit it with a flat bat down the ground, he lofts it towards long-off where Younis runs in and takes a well-judged catch
Gul bowls a yorker-length full toss on off stump, driven to cover
that's it! Pakistan win two valuable Super Eight points, Vaas pulls the last ball, a slower one from Gul, to midwicket
